title: User Authentication Test
description: As a system administrator, I want to verify that user login functionality works correctly so that I can ensure secure access to the application.
iWant: to verify that user login functionality works correctly
soThat: I can ensure secure access to the application
acceptanceCriteria: Given valid credentials, when a user attempts to log in, then they should be granted access to the dashboard
Given invalid credentials, when a user attempts to log in, then they should see an appropriate error message
Given a locked account, when a user attempts to log in, then they should be notified of the account status
